gmmaker > gameEvents

gameEvents 

interface gameEvents

Summary

Methods from gameEvents

addEventListener(eventName: "roundStart", options: stepEventOptions, listener: () => void)

Attach a function (listener) to an event. This function will be called when the event happens. An event can have multiple listeners attached to it.

void"> addEventListener gmm.d.ts:898 
addEventListener(eventName: "roundStart", options: stepEventOptions, listener: () => void) â†’ {}

Attach a function (listener) to an event. This function will be called when the event happens. An event can have multiple listeners attached to it.

Read more about events here.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
eventName "roundStart"

The name of the event to attach the listener to.
options stepEventOptions

Unique options to change when and how the listener will be called.
listener () => void

The function to attach.
